title: Identify, describe impact of being rentier state

content.question: Define a rentier (rent-seeking) state. Identify one rentier state among the six AP Comparative Politics and Government countries. Describe a problem that a rentier state typically faces that has an impact on economic development.

frqParts.text: Define a rentier (rent-seeking) state. Identify one rentier state among the six AP Comparative Politics and Government countries. Describe a problem that a rentier state typically faces that has an impact on economic development.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
